posts.post_title: FS: A couple SGC Graded T206 Commons SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello, friends.  I would like to sell the following cards via Paypal gift or owed.  Shipping included.  Thank you very much for looking and have a great day!


Harry Arndt     SGC 30 Pied. 350 (tougher common and nice for grade) $Sold

Jack White SGC 40 Pied. 350 (Not of White Stripes fame sorry) $Sold

                           Thanks to Big Dan for picking up the pair!

Best, 

Andy

Happy Father's Day!  Prices reduced.

Best,

ag
